title: All-optical wavelength shifting in a semiconductor laser using resonant nonlinearities
title_cn: 使用谐振非线性的半导体激光器中的全光波长偏移
abstract: For future ultrafast all-optical networks, new optical devices are required that can directly manipulate communication channels and shift their wavelength over the bandwidth of an optical fibre (50 THz). Solutions based on nonlinear processes have been proposed, but these suffer from having only low efficiencies as a result of low nonlinear susceptibilities. Here, we demonstrate all-optical wavelength conversion of a near-infrared beam using a resonant nonlinear process within a terahertz quantum cascade laser. The process is based on injecting a low-power continuous-wave near-infrared beam in resonance with the interband transitions of the quantum cascade laser. This results in an enhanced nonlinearity that allows efficient generation of the difference and sum frequency, shifting the frequency of the near-infrared beam by the frequency of the quantum cascade laser. Efficiencies of 0.13% are demonstrated, which are equivalent to those obtained using free electron lasers. As well as having important implications in its application in ultrafast wavelength shifting, this work also opens up the possibility of efficiently upconverting terahertz radiation to the near-infrared and enables the study of high terahertz–optical field interactions with quantum structures using quantum cascade lasers.
abstract_cn: 对于将来的超快全光网络，需要新的光学设备，这些设备可以直接操纵通信信道并在光纤带宽（50＆＃160 THz）上改变其波长。已经提出了基于非线性过程的解决方案，但是由于非线性敏感性低，所以这些解决方案仅具有低效率。在这里，我们演示了使用太赫兹量子级联激光器中的谐振非线性过程对近红外光束进行全光波长转换。该过程基于与量子级联激光器的带间跃迁共振注入低功率连续波近红外光束。这导致增强的非线性，该非线性允许有效产生差和和频率，从而将近红外光束的频率偏移量子级联激光器的频率。证明效率为0.13％，与使用自由电子激光器获得的效率相当。除了在超快波长转换中的应用产生重要意义外，这项工作还为将太赫兹辐射有效地上转换为近红外光提供了可能性，并使得能够利用量子级联研究高太赫兹与量子结构的光场相互作用。激光。

title: Quantum-limited frequency fluctuations in a terahertz laser
title_cn: 太赫兹激光器中受量子限制的频率波动
abstract: Quantum cascade lasers can be considered the primary achievement of electronic band structure engineering, showing how artificial materials can be created through quantum design to have tailor-made properties that are otherwise non-existent in nature. Indeed, quantum cascade lasers can be used as powerful testing grounds of the fundamental physical parameters determined by their quantum nature, including the intrinsic linewidth of laser emission, which in such lasers is significantly affected by the optical and thermal photon number generated in the laser cavity. Here, we report experimental evidence of linewidth values approaching the quantum limit in far-infrared quantum cascade lasers. Despite the broadening induced by thermal photons, the measured linewidth results narrower than that found in any other semiconductor laser to date. By performing noise measurements with unprecedented sensitivity levels, we highlight the key role of gain medium engineering and demonstrate that properly designed semiconductor-heterostructure lasers can unveil the mechanisms underlying the laser-intrinsic phase noise, revealing the link between device properties and the quantum-limited linewidth.
abstract_cn: 量子级联激光器可以被认为是电子能带结构工程的主要成就，展示了如何通过量子设计来创造人造材料，使其具有量身定制的特性，而这些特性在自然界中是不存在的。确实，量子级联激光器可以用作由其量子性质决定的基本物理参数的强大测试基础，这些基本物理参数包括激光发射的固有线宽，在此类激光器中，激光谐振腔中产生的光学和热光子数会极大地影响其。在这里，我们报告了在远红外量子级联激光器中线宽值接近量子极限的实验证据。尽管由热光子引起了加宽，但是所测得的线宽结果却比迄今为止任何其他半导体激光器中的窄。通过以前所未有的灵敏度水平执行噪声测量，我们突出了增益介质工程学的关键作用，并证明设计正确的半导体-异质结构激光器可以揭示激光本征相位噪声的潜在机制，从而揭示器件性能与量子限制之间的联系。线宽。

title: Solution-processed inorganic bulk nano-heterojunctions and their application to solar cells
title_cn: 固溶处理的无机本体纳米异质结及其在太阳能电池中的应用
abstract: In the last decade, solution-processed quantum dot/nanocrystal solar cells have emerged as a very promising technology for third-generation thin-film photovoltaics because of their low cost and high energy-harnessing potential. Quantum dot solar cell architectures developed to date have relied on the use of bulk-like thin films of colloidal quantum dots. Here, we introduce the bulk nano-heterojunction concept for inorganic solution-processed semiconductors. This platform can be readily implemented by mixing different semiconductor nanocrystals in solution and allows for the development of optoelectronic nanocomposite materials with tailored optoelectronic properties. We present bulk nano-heterojunction solar cells based on n-type Bi2S3 nanocrystals and p-type PbS quantum dots, which demonstrate a more than a threefold improvement in device performance compared to their bilayer analogue, as a result of suppressed recombination.
abstract_cn: 在过去的十年中，溶液处理的量子点/纳米晶体太阳能电池因其低成本和高能量利用潜力而成为第三代薄膜光伏技术中非常有前途的技术。 迄今为止开发的量子点太阳能电池体系结构依赖于胶体量子点的块状薄膜的使用。 在这里，我们介绍了用于无机溶液处理的半导体的体纳米异质结概念。 通过在溶液中混合不同的半导体纳米晶体，可以轻松实现该平台，并允许开发具有定制光电特性的光电纳米复合材料。 我们介绍了基于n型Bi 2 S 3 纳米晶体和p型PbS量子点的体纳米异质结太阳能电池，这些器件证明了器件的改进超过三倍 由于抑制了重组，因此与双层类似物相比具有更高的性能。

title: Conversion of broadband to narrowband thermal emission through energy recycling
title_cn: 通过能量回收将宽带转换为窄带热辐射
abstract: Converting from a broadband to a narrowband thermal emission spectrum with minimal loss of energy is important in the creation of efficient environmental sensors and biosensors as well as thermo-photovoltaic power generation systems. Here, we demonstrate such thermal emission control by manipulating photonic modes with photonic crystals as well as material absorption with quantum-well intersubband transitions. We show that the emission peak intensity for our device can be more than four times greater than that of a blackbody sample under the same input power and thermal management conditions due to an increase in the temperature compared to the blackbody reference, and the emission bandwidth and angular spread are narrowed by a factor of 30 and 8, respectively. These results indicate that the energy saved by thermal emission control can be recycled and concentrated to enhance the narrow peak emission intensity.
abstract_cn: 在创建高效的环境传感器和生物传感器以及热电光伏发电系统方面，以最小的能量损耗从宽带转换为窄带热发射光谱非常重要。 在这里，我们通过操纵具有光子晶体的光子模式以及具有量子阱子带间跃迁的材料吸收来演示这种热发射控制。 我们显示，在相同的输入功率和热管理条件下，由于与黑体基准相比温度升高，我们的设备的发射峰强度可以比黑体样品高四倍以上。 角度扩展分别缩小了30倍和8倍。 这些结果表明，通过热排放控制节省的能量可以被回收和集中，以增强狭窄的峰值排放强度。

title: A compact X-ray free-electron laser emitting in the sub-ångström region
title_cn: 在次昂斯特伦地区发射的紧凑型X射线自由电子激光
abstract: The free-electron laser, first proposed by Madey in 1971, has significantly reduced laser wavelengths to the vacuum ultraviolet and soft X-ray regions. Recently, an X-ray free-electron laser (XFEL) was operated at 1.2 Å at the Linac Coherent Light Source (LCLS). Here, we report the successful generation of sub-ångström laser light using a compact XFEL source, combining a short-period undulator with an 8 GeV electron beam. The shortest wavelength attained—0.634 Å (63.4 pm)—is four orders of magnitude smaller than the 694 nm generated by Maiman's first laser. The maximum power exceeded 10 GW with a pulse duration of 10−14 s. This achievement will contribute to the widespread use of XFEL sources and provide broad opportunities for exploring new fields in science.

title: Detection of photons emitted from single erbium atoms in energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy
title_cn: 能量色散X射线光谱法检测单个single原子发出的光子
abstract: The detection of photons emitted from single quantum objects is highly desirable for the diagnosis of nanoscale devices using microscopes. An extremely tiny probe (∼0.1 nm) with high current recently became available for aberration-corrected scanning transmission electron microscopy, and it is possible for individual atoms in nanoscale devices to be excited using such a highly focused probe. Here, we demonstrate the successful detection of characteristic X-ray signals from single erbium atoms using energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy. The intensities of the erbium L and M lines from a single erbium atom were extremely weak in comparison to the N edge of electron energy-loss spectroscopy, demonstrating the intrinsic difficulty in sensing single atoms using X-ray spectroscopy. Nevertheless, this work will certainly help in the advance towards obtaining X-ray spectra from single atoms and to evaluate the fluorescence yield on a single-atom basis.
abstract_cn: 对于使用显微镜诊断纳米级设备，非常需要检测从单个量子物体发出的光子。 最近，可用于像差校正的扫描透射电子显微镜的极小探针（＆＃8764; 0.1 nm）可以使用这种高度聚焦的探针激发纳米级器件中的单个原子。 在这里，我们演示了使用能量色散X射线光谱技术成功检测出来自单个atoms原子的特征X射线信号的过程。 与电子能量损失谱的N边缘相比，来自单个原子的L L和M线的强度非常弱，这证明了使用X射线光谱法感测单个原子的固有困难。 尽管如此，这项工作必将有助于从单个原子获得X射线光谱并评估基于单个原子的荧光产量。</ p>

title: Looking around corners and through thin turbid layers in real time with scattered incoherent light
title_cn: 通过散射的不相干光实时查看角落和穿过薄薄的混浊层
abstract: Imaging with optical resolution through turbid media is a long sought-after goal with important applications in deep tissue imaging. Although extensively studied, this goal was considered impractical until recently. Adaptive-optics techniques, which can correct weak aberrations, are inadequate for turbid samples, where light is scattered to complex speckle patterns with a number of modes greatly exceeding the number of degrees of control. This conception changed after the demonstration of coherent focusing through turbid media by wavefront-shaping, using spatial light modulators. Here, we show that wavefront-shaping enables wide-field imaging through turbid layers with incoherent illumination, and imaging of occluded objects using light scattered from diffuse walls. In contrast to the recently introduced schemes for imaging through turbid media, our technique does not require coherent sources, interferometric detection, raster-scanning or off-line reconstruction. Our results bring wavefront-shaping closer to practical applications and realize the vision of looking through ‘walls’ and around corners.
abstract_cn: 通过浑浊的介质进行光学分辨率成像是一个长期追求的目标，在深部组织成像中具有重要的应用。尽管进行了广泛研究，但直到最近才认为此目标不切实际。可以校正弱像差的自适应光学技术不足以解决浑浊的样品，在这些样品中，光被散射为具有多种模式的复杂斑点图案，其模式大大超过了控制程度。在通过使用空间光调制器通过波前整形通过浑浊介质进行相干聚焦的演示之后，这个概念发生了变化。在这里，我们展示了波前整形可以通过具有不相干照明的混浊层进行宽场成像，并使用从扩散壁散射的光对被遮挡的物体进行成像。与最近引入的通过混浊介质成像的方案相比，我们的技术不需要相干源，干涉检测，光栅扫描或离线重建。我们的结果使波前整形更接近实际应用，并实现了透视“墙”的愿景。和拐角处。

title: Regenerative oscillation and four-wave mixing in graphene optoelectronics
title_cn: 石墨烯光电中的再生振荡和四波混合
abstract: The unique linear and massless band structure of graphene in a purely two-dimensional Dirac fermionic structure has led to intense research in fields ranging from condensed matter physics to nanoscale device applications covering the electrical, thermal, mechanical and optical domains. Here, we report three consecutive first observations in graphene–silicon hybrid optoelectronic devices—ultralow-power resonant optical bistability, self-induced regenerative oscillations and coherent four-wave mixing—all at few-femtojoule cavity recirculating energies. These observations, in comparison with control measurements on solely monolithic silicon cavities, are enabled only by the dramatically large and ultrafast χ(3) nonlinearities in graphene and the large Q/V ratios in wavelength-localized photonic crystal cavities. These third-order nonlinear results demonstrate the feasibility and versatility of hybrid two-dimensional graphene–silicon nanophotonic devices for next-generation chip-scale high-speed optical communications, radiofrequency optoelectronics and all-optical signal processing.
abstract_cn: 纯二维Dirac铁离子结构中的石墨烯独特的线性和无质量能带结构，导致了在从凝聚态物理到涉及电，热，机械和光学领域的纳米级器件应用领域的广泛研究。在这里，我们报告了在石墨烯硅混合光电子器件中的三个连续的第一个观察结果，这些观察结果都是在几毫微焦耳腔的循环能量下进行的。与仅在单片硅腔上进行的控制测量相比，这些观察结果只能通过石墨烯中极大且超快的＆＃967; （3）非线性以及波长-波长下较大的Q / V比来实现局部光子晶体腔。这些三阶非线性结果证明了混合二维二维石墨烯硅纳米光子器件在下一代芯片规模高速光通信，射频光电和全光信号处理中的可行性和多功能性。

title: Broadband dye-sensitized upconversion of near-infrared light
title_cn: 宽带染料敏化近红外光的上转换
abstract: Photon upconversion of near-infrared photons is a promising way to overcome the Shockley–Queisser efficiency limit of 32% of a single-junction solar cell. However, the practical applicability of the most efficient known upconversion materials at moderate light intensities is limited by their extremely weak and narrowband near-infrared absorption. Here, we introduce the concept of an upconversion material where an organic near-infrared dye is used as an antenna for the β-NaYF4:Yb,Er nanoparticles in which the upconversion occurs. The overall upconversion by the dye-sensitized nanoparticles is dramatically enhanced (by a factor of ∼3,300) as a result of increased absorptivity and overall broadening of the absorption spectrum of the upconverter. The proposed concept can be extended to cover any part of the solar spectrum by using a set of dye molecules with overlapping absorption spectra acting as an extremely broadband antenna system, connected to suitable upconverters.
abstract_cn: 近红外光子的光子上转换是一种克服单结太阳能电池32％的Shockley Queisser效率极限的有前途的方法。但是，最有效的已知上转换材料在中等光强度下的实际适用性受到其极弱和窄带的近红外吸收的限制。在这里，我们介绍了上转换材料的概念，其中有机近红外染料用作发生上转换的＆＃946; -NaYF 4 ：Yb，Er纳米粒子的天线。染料敏化的纳米粒子的整体上转换显着增强（系数为3,300倍），这是因为吸收系数增加以及上转换器吸收光谱的整体变宽。通过使用一组具有重叠吸收光谱的染料分子作为极宽带天线系统，并连接到合适的上变频器，可以将提议的概念扩展到涵盖太阳光谱的任何部分。
